name: Gawker on Black - Gizmodo, Kotaku, io9, Lifehacker
description: This script should work on ALL gawker sites (Blog view for best results, untested on other views). Color schemes changed to white/greys on black with certain key colors kept intact to help differentiate between various gawker sites.
additional_info:
Update: Feb. 08 - Fixed endless loading glitch, readded right container to articles (does not seem to be removable without causing issues), cleaned up right container, fixed a few difficult font colors.

Update: Feb. 12 - Fixed hopefully last of color issues, found one set of colors seemingly only used on lifehacker, adjusted to improve readability.
